DIA_Renegade_HELLO_03_02: I see you're wearing a uniform.
DIA_Renegade_HELLO_03_03: What unit do you belong to?
DIA_Renegade_HELLO_03_04: Who are you and what are you doing here?
DIA_Renegade_HELLO_Gerwin_03_03: That's very interesting, because I thought we were the ones from it.
DIA_Renegade_HELLO_Gerwin_03_05: You're trying to deceive me, boy, and I don't like it.
DIA_Renegade_HELLO_Gerwin_03_06: The sergeant will definitely want to talk to you.
DIA_Renegade_HELLO_Gerwin_03_07: But first, let's have some fun!
DIA_Renegade_HELLO_Roderich_03_02: And why did the commander send you so far from home?
DIA_Renegade_HELLO_Search_15_01: I'm looking for Sergeant Gerwin. Roderich hasn't heard from him in a week.
DIA_Renegade_HELLO_Search_03_02: In that case, we'd be happy to take you to him.
DIA_Renegade_HELLO_Pay_15_01: To be an errand boy and earn a few coins for it.
DIA_Renegade_HELLO_Pay_03_02: You can't help it. That's the fate of a city man.
DIA_Renegade_HELLO_Pay_03_03: You work your ass off, and you get as much as a molerat can dig up.
DIA_Renegade_HELLO_Pay_03_04: We, for example, don't have to work hard anymore and we can afford the best wine in the area.
DIA_Renegade_HELLO_Pay_03_05: And you know what I'll tell you, boy? If you became one of us, you could afford them too!
DIA_Renegade_HELLO_Pay_15_06: How do you make so much money?
DIA_Renegade_HELLO_Pay_03_07: It's simple. We changed the sergeant.
DIA_Renegade_HELLO_Who_03_02: Someone who has a head on his shoulders and doesn't blindly listen to Roderich's foolish orders.
DIA_Renegade_HELLO_Who_03_03: The guy may be the leader, but at least we have a lot of freedom. And we can drink as much beer as our bellies can hold!
DIA_Renegade_HELLO_What_15_01: What happened to the previous sergeant?
DIA_Renegade_HELLO_What_03_02: He decided to go for a little swim.
DIA_Renegade_HELLO_What_03_04: Till said he swelled up a bit last night, so the lurkers aren't likely to touch him again, but the scavengers...
DIA_Renegade_HELLO_What_03_06: These birds will not despise even a few weeks old meat. Hahahaha!
DIA_Renegade_HELLO_WhatDo_15_01: Actually, what are you doing here?
DIA_Renegade_HELLO_WhatDo_03_02: You ask too many questions. Let me ask you a question for a change.
DIA_Renegade_HELLO_WhatDo_03_03: Are you with us or with Roderich?
DIA_Renegade_HELLO_WithGerwin_03_02: Yeah? We're about to find out.
DIA_Renegade_HELLO_WithGerwin_03_03: The sergeant will definitely want to talk to you.
DIA_Renegade_HELLO_WithGerwin_03_04: But first, you have to give me your weapon. Safety regulations, you understand.
DIA_Renegade_HELLO_WithGerwin_15_05: You want me to give you my weapon?
DIA_Renegade_HELLO_WithGerwin_03_06: Do you have a problem with that?
DIA_Renegade_HELLO_WithRoderich_15_01: Roderich will know of your betrayal.
DIA_Renegade_HELLO_WithRoderich_03_02: Sorry, boy, but this is where I have to disagree with you.
DIA_Renegade_HELLO_Keep_15_01: I think I'll keep it with me after all.
DIA_Renegade_HELLO_Keep_03_02: I dare to disagree with you.
DIA_Renegade_HELLO_Give_03_02: You know what, boy? I'm thinking it must be hard as hell for you with all that stuff.
DIA_Renegade_HELLO_Give_03_03: We'd be happy to watch them for you, while you talk to the boss.
DIA_Renegade_HELLO_Give_03_04: Follow me. Just don't try any tricks.
DIA_Renegade_HELLO_NoOne_15_01: I don't belong to any unit.
DIA_Renegade_HELLO_NoOne_03_03: I don't know how you found us here, but the sergeant will certainly want to talk to you.
DIA_Renegade_HELLO_NoOne_03_05: Not really, but if you really want to, you'll meet him too.
DIA_Renegade_HELLO_SearchGerwin_03_02: In that case, it's your lucky day, boy. We'd be happy to take you to the sergeant.
DIA_Renegade_HELLO_Lost_15_01: I guess I got a little lost.
DIA_Renegade_HELLO_Lost_03_02: Oh, no, boy. I think you're exactly where you're supposed to be.
DIA_Renegade_HELLO_RoderichSend_03_03: I don't see a uniform on you, but the sergeant will certainly want to talk to you.
DIA_Renegade_HELLO_Roderich_Pay_Choice: Because he's paying me to do it.
